value.description: When properly treated and processed, sewage sludge becomes compost which requires further treatment to be useful as fertilizer.
A barrel filled with fecal sludge, can be dumped, burned, or composted.

mods.li: ReGrowth: Biomes of The Rim - Boreal Expansion
Sparkling Worlds - Modular Core - Reduced features
Slightly More Realistic Wool Production Revived

ThingDef.label: camel fleece
ThingDef.description: The untreated fleece of a Camel. It must be made in to wool at a Tailor's bench before it can be used.

RecipeDef.label: weave Camel wool
RecipeDef.description: Create Camel wool from Camel fleece.

value.description: The untreated fleece of a Camel. It must be made in to wool at a Tailor's loom before it can be used.

mods.li: Slightly More Realistic Wool Production Revived
